mental_rules: The best offense is an electrified defense - force enemies to come to you
Early rotation wins games - be first to claim final ring position
Always be fencing - even in active fights, drop quick opportunistic fences
Ultimate Accelerants are your best friend - carry them religiously
Don't hold ultimate too long - deploy pylon proactively when fight is expected
Hide your nodes - fences behind cover are fences that work
Trust your setup - enemies pushing through fences are vulnerable, not you
Spread defense 360 degrees - don't overstack one entrance
Information is power - fence triggers reveal enemy positions, communicate them
Never wander alone - isolated Wattson is dead Wattson
Practice hybrid play in pubs - quick fences during chaos, not just elaborate forts
End-game is your domain - dominate final rings through superior preparation
Shield sustain wins wars - positioning near pylon gives unlimited shield trading
Second pylon destroys first - only redeploy strategically
Buildings are your kingdom - interior defense is where Wattson excels
